===== Executing Text Filter =====
===== Reading text and vectorizing =====
(491, 74688)
===== Feature selection - SelectKBest =====
(491, 1000)
===== Decision Tree Classifier =====
===== Hyperparameter tunning  =====

criterion : gini
max_depth : 100
min_samples_split : 100
